column4: I installed an application...And now I have no idea where it is. Is there a way to search for it?
go to /var/cache/apt/archive and find the deb package for the application. Is it there?
run dpkg -contents on the deb package. Look for anything with bin in the path...
run dpkg --contents <package>  <-- two dashes. Look for anything with bin in the path...
